short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to view source code on GitHub with a dark theme instead of the default light theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you use github extensively, but prefer a darker theme when viewing source code, this app can do just that! Install it and you will be presented with a vibrantink theme for all source code files and diffs while viewing github.com.
